job_purpose: Exciting opportunity for a Mid Level Full Stack Software Engineer with experience in .Net and React or a Backend .Net Developer to join a Corporate Business with internal growth opportunities.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop and maintain software solutions using .Net and React technologies
Write clean, maintainable code focusing on simplicity
Contribute to large scale projects and high-traffic platforms
Work in a cloud environment, preferably Azure
Communicate effectively and demonstrate a learning mindset
required_qualifications: 5+ years experience as a Mid Level Software Engineer
Experience with microservices and Serverless architectures
Ability to write simple and maintainable code
Experience in large scale projects and high-traffic platforms (advantage)
Experience in a cloud environment, preferably Azure
Strong communication skills and willingness to learn
company_details: A well-known, popular, and large eCommerce business offering internal growth opportunities and a collaborative work environment. Location: Melbourne. Full Working Rights required.
